title: Tokyo in spring
brief_description: A survey of the tourist attractions of Tokyo - the traditional Doll Festival for girls, the tea ceremony and cherry blossom by day and night. Includes types of accommodation for tourists, the public transport system and the spring presentation of the famous Tokyo review.
description: A survey of the tourist attractions of Tokyo - the traditional Doll Festival for girls, the tea ceremony and cherry blossom by day and night. Includes types of accommodation for tourists, the public transport system and the spring presentation of the famous Tokyo review.
